description: Apruba Roy is a highly experienced chef with 10 years in the culinary industry. With a portfolio of 50 recipes, Apruba brings creativity and expertise to every dish. Known for his culinary finesse, Apruba's recipes are loved by food enthusiasts. His dedication and passion have earned him a substantial following, with 500 likes on his dishes.
cookingMethod:
1. Marinate the fish with turmeric and salt.
2. Heat mustard oil in a pan and fry the fish until golden brown. Set aside.
3. In the same pan, sauté the onions until translucent.
4. Add the tomatoes and cook until they soften.
5. Add turmeric, salt, and water to make a gravy.
6. Add the fried fish and simmer for a few minutes.
7. Serve hot with steamed rice.
